DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if targeted interventions will help people to stop or reduce smoking better than standard interventions using very low nicotine content (VLNC) cigarettes. This developmental pilot study (n=20) will determine the feasibility of the treatment approach and methodology, and lead to refinements for a subsequent randomized controlled trial (RCT).
DOC.brief_title: Facilitating Smoking Cessation With Reduced Nicotine Cigarettes
